title: Pictary 2.1.3 – Captures your emotions, feelings and look on your mac
content: Imagine an App that captures your emotions, feelings and look while you’re using your Mac! Pictary will take care of all that! It creates a personal diary but instead words it uses pictures to capture you and others in front of your Mac. Utilizing the built in Camera it takes pictures every time you start, […]

title: Flightradar24 1.9.8 – Turns your Mac into an air traffic radar monitor
content: Flightradar24 turns your Mac into an air traffic radar monitor. See airplane traffic around the world move in real-time. Discover why millions are already using Flightradar24. Please note that coverage will vary. We are rapidly improving Flightradar24’s coverage across the world.   Features: Planes moving in real-time Comprehensive information for each individual plane, including route, […]

title: QuickPick 2.1.3 – Seamless document launcher
content: QuickPick is an application and document launcher designed to feel as if it’s part of Mac OS X itself. Just drag and drop any number of applications or documents into the QuickPick window, and they’ll only ever be a mouse click, flick, or key press away.   QuickPick is a great place to store documents […]

title: Writer Pro 1.0 – Professional writing suite
content: Writer Pro is a professional writing suite that gives you full control over your notes, drafts and edits.    Workflow: Note – Write – Edit – Read. Each stage has a task-specific typeface and color. Syntax Control scans the syntax of English, French, German, Italian, and Spanish text and highlights your adjectives, nouns, verbs, adverbs, […]

title: MoneyWiz 1.5.0 – Personal finance solution
content: MoneyWiz lets you do more with your money. View all your accounts, budgets and bills in one place. Experience reports on a whole new level. title: LensFlares 1.1 – Bring your photos to life
content: LensFlares is a brand new photo editor for adding optical effects on your Mac. title: Jaksta 1.3.3 – Record and download streaming audio and video
content: Jaksta is the easiest way to download and convert Video, Audio and MP3s from the Web to your Mac. Just open Jaksta, then play a video or song in your browser, and Jaksta saves a perfect digital copy to your Mac’s hard disc, or converts it to several popular device formats. Jaksta is the only […]

title: Chocolat 2.1 – Native Cocoa text editor
content: Chocolat is a new text editor that combines native Cocoa with powerful text editing tools.    Features: Split editing Code completion Live errors Folding Symbol list Blockedit Vim mode Jump to definition Project find Go to file Web preview Documentation   WHAT’S NEW Version 2.1: File -> Reveal in Project Bar Added “open in browser” […]

title: Labels & Addresses 1.6.6 – Powerful label and envelope printing tool
content: Labels & Addresses is a home and office tool for printing all sorts of labels, envelopes, inventory labels, and price tags. Merge-printing capability makes the program a great tool for holiday seasons by helping users to design and print multiple greeting envelopes and postcards with automatically substitutable addresses and postal barcodes.   Key features: Change text […]

title: FlipBook Creator Pro 2.0.9 – Build Professional Flash & Html5 Flipbook
